oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Market issues in organic meat and dairy markets
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Santucci, Prof. Fabio Maria
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Markets and trade
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The paper is a meta study and analyses the existing data about production, sales, prices, willingness to pay about the two commodities.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Santucci, Prof. Fabio Maria (2002) Market issues in organic meat and dairy markets. Paper at: Symposium on organic markets for meat and dairy products, FAO Headquarters, Rome, Italy, Europe, Planet Hearth, August 28, 2002. [Unpublished]
